attributes.title: Ouch 🥺✨
attributes.review: I decided to download this app to support our lovely 💗✨Cheeto ✨💗 and well let’s just say when I opened it my fingers started burning! Every time I touched the screen my fingers burned. I then got a notification saying if I signed my name in blood that I would vote for c h e e t o  then my fingers would stop burning. When I declined, my fingers fell off completely and I’m currently typing this with my tung. 1 Star!!! 😡😡

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: Hi so I was looking and then I saw this🤮 and it isn’t like people actually read this stuff unless they are like 45 years old and have nothing better to do with there life other than to yell at Tik tokers and read this. Actually gross and I don’t recommend to anyone that actually has a brain because you will not have one after using this app.

attributes.title: I would give 0 stars if I could
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to give our feminist, BLM, LGBT+ president a chance but then I saw that he wanted my number 😫 what about Melania?? What kind of president would do that to his First Lady?? The opening pic is also very scary because it looks like he’s crying and has small hands which isn’t very desirable from a president but I gave this app a chance and it failed 😒

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I recently got this app and ever since my phone has been very laggy! Really disappointed overall, I wanted to support our President but this app makes it very difficult! It also keeps popping up with unnecessary ads that have nothing to do with the election??? Very bad! Would never buy this again! Probably voting for Biden after this:((((

attributes.title: Good app... but needs some work :/
attributes.review: I found out the app was actually taking my information and while i left my phone on the counter it would take pictures of me getting my children ready for the day. if i could give this a lower rating i would in a heart beat. i would even sue if i this man didn’t take my house away from me

attributes.title: Confusing
attributes.review: When I first got into the app I just wanted to check something out and then delete it but it wouldn’t let me look at something without putting in my phone number. So I completely shut down my phone and THEN it worked but non of my progress was saved on any of my apps so I believe it is all this dumb apps fault.

attributes.title: Gross and disgusting
attributes.review: I thought that all these reviews were just a joke but no this app really is disgusting. I downloaded it and then in took a total of 13 days until i was able to open it and then when I opened it it’s was a black screen fir maybe 10 minutes and then finally I saw the thing that scared me the most and that was him. NAKED

attributes.title: broken app 🤕
attributes.review: i was initially SOOO excited to download and keep up with my orange king’s campaign 🍊🥰 but the app consistently crashed!! siri herself told me to put her out of her misery :(( i tried restarting my phone but then it started smoking and overheating 😧😵 i’m still putting out the fire right now but i really hope trump can solve the issues in this app the same way he solved covid in the u.s. 😌🧚🏻‍♀️✨😍

attributes.title: Trump app
attributes.review: This app is simply horrid. I first opened the app to see an orange monkey looking back at me. I was surly frightened. I do not recommend getting this app. It’s a waste of time and the only thing it does is take up storage space. I will be deleting this app immediately and washing my eyes. No one should have to see an orange monkey. It’s just not right. This app deserves to be banned. Thank you and have a good day.

attributes.title: Terrible😔
attributes.review: when I got this app I really didn’t expect to see trumps face right away. quite honestly it scared me so bad I threw my phone across the room. overall, a quite terrible experience. they should put a warning that you have to see such a thing when you open the app. writing this review to protect future children from the same fate I suffered. 🙈🙈🙈🙈
